message.content:
cs.DC, cs.PF, cs.AR, cs.SC, cs.NA. 

The paper discusses a new checkpointing mechanism for hybrid CUDA/MPI computations across multiple computer nodes, which falls under the category of distributed computing (cs.DC). The use of Unified Virtual Memory (UVM) and CUDA programming also suggests a possible fit for performance (cs.PF) and architecture (cs.AR) sub-categories. The paper also discusses the use of supercomputers, which could potentially fall under scientific computing (cs.SC) and numerical analysis (cs.NA) sub-categories.
